title: Momo Mia Pizza-Veg
content: Epic combination of signature pan crust, delicious paneer & veg momos topped with spicy Schezwan sauce, onion, capsicum, sweet corn & 100% mozzarella

title: Only Cheesy
content: Pizza topped with cheesy dressing and mozzarella cheese for that extraaa cheesy flavor.

title: Classic Sausage
content: Pizza topped with our Classic Pan sauce, flavorful chicken sausage and cheesy dressing.
